text: Ponnana Neram () is a 2001 Indian Tamil-language drama film directed by the duo Ravi-Raja. The film features Ramarajan and Prathyusha in the leading roles, while Shanmugasundaram and Kadhal Sukumar appear in supporting roles. Featuring music composed by Pradeep Ravi, the film was released on 14 November 2001.http://www.in.com/tv/movies/jaya-movie-221/ponnana-neram-23060.html == Plot == Ramarajan portrays a police officer and Prathyusha stars as a college student, who is a prankster who often gets others into trouble. Prathyusha witnesses few terrorists planning to kill a minister — but nobody is ready to believe her. Whether Ramarajan stops the terrorist attack forms the crux of the story. == Cast == *Ramarajan *Prathyusha as Pooja *Alex *Shanmugasundaram *Ganthimathi *Mansoor Ali Khan *Kadhal Sukumar == Soundtrack == The soundtrack was composed by Pradeep Ravi. *"Naan Ready" *"Hello Hai Mamo" *"Kolusu Kolusu" *"Thimu Thimu Roja" == References == Category:Indian films Category:2001 films Category:2000s Tamil-language films Category:Indian action drama films Category:Fictional portrayals of the Tamil Nadu Police
title: Ponnana Neram
